data.name: Lunar Axe
data.detailed_description:
Lunar Axe is a point-and-click adventure game with locations and story inspired by real places with incredible hand-drawing art.


STORY
After a big earthquake in the city, ruins of an old building collapse and you end up trapped inside a big abandoned house. Find a way out and unravel the mystery of the inexplicable tremors, meet the guardian spirit of a mystical artifact and learn its relation to recent events, before it's too late.


IMMERSIVE
Investigate, collect, match clues and objects through various puzzles and HOG scenes. Find historical items that will help you understand the mystery that surrounds the city. Explore different locations based on real environments that offer a perfect combination of legend and history, learning more about the real facts that inspired the game with a gallery of references.


PUZZLES
You must solve puzzles and explore different environments to find a mystical weapon and discover the mystery behind earthquakes that are destroying the city.

Features in full version:

  • 35+ Diferent scenes based on real locations
  • 30+ Puzzles and HOG scenes
  • Amazing hand-drawn 2D art
  • Original soundtrack
  • History inspired by Brazilian folklore
  • Bonus material with storyline references
  • Prevent the destruction of the city of São Luís

data.short_description: After a big earthquake in the city, ruins of an old building collapse and you end up trapped inside an abandoned house. Find a way out and unravel the mystery of inexplicable tremors, revealing ancient secrets and a mystical artifact, before the city is destroyed.
data.supported_languages: English, Portuguese - Brazil, French, German, Spanish - Spain, Russian
data.reviews:
“It’s a very impressive game with well thought out puzzles, a great sense of atmosphere and lots of beautiful hand-drawn artwork. A well crafted adventure well worth checking out.”
Alpha Beta Gamer

“The puzzles available are so well thought out and planned! As I was uncovering more and more of how to escape the house, I was amazed at just how in-depth they have pieced everything together.”
Beta Tested, Game Reviewed

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows® 10
  • Processor: 1.5Ghz
  • Graphics: Intel HD Graphics 3000 with 384 MB of RAM
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 3 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Is not essential
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows® 10
  • Processor: 2.4Ghz
  • Graphics: Modern NVIDIA or AMD graphics card
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Is not essential

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Linux Kernel 3.2
  • Processor: i3
  • Graphics: 4 GB RAM
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Linux Kernel 3.2
  • Processor: i3
  • Graphics: 4 GB RAM

highlighted.name: You have to dig deeper than that!
